title: Run
review: It's hard to describe what I mean by this but I think it's too Netflixy. Nothing is left to the imagination and everything you could possibly know about the plot or characters is clearly spelled out for you. There is nothing to think about after you're done watching, so why not just move on to the next big streaming hit off the production line? I laughed when I saw that the hospital had a load of armed guards. Michael, if you're reading this, your country is a joke to me.
